statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT id, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 50 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes = (SELECT MAX(likes) FROM social_media_engagement_metrics);
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT AVG(likes) AS average_likes, AVG(comments) AS average_comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes < comments ORDER BY likes ASC, comments DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT influencer_name, followers, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerPartnerships ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE likes < 50 AND shares > 20;
SELECT influencer_name, partnership_start_date FROM InfluencerPartnerships WHERE partnership_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments, shares FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE post_id = 1234;
SELECT influencer_name, followers, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerPartnerships WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes AS total_likes, comments AS total_comments, shares AS total_shares FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE likes > 500 AND shares > 100;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerPartnerships WHERE partnership_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND partnership_start_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, followers, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerPartnerships WHERE engagement_rate BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.0;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE shares > 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_volume FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, partnership_status FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partnership_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_category, trend_volume FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_volume >= 5000 ORDER BY trend_volume DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) as total_partnerships FROM influencer_partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_partnerships > 3;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, partnership_status FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE brand_id = 1001 AND partnership_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM media_marketing_agency WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT influencer_id, partnership_type, start_date, end_date FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partnership_type = 'Sponsored';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1001
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT agency_name, location FROM media_marketing_agency ORDER BY established_date DESC
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, partnership_type FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT id, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT trend_id, insights FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, start_date FROM client_accounts WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT campaign_id, performance_metric, value FROM campaign_performance WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, partnership_date FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partnership_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT trend_id, analysis_date, SUBSTRING(insights, 1, 50) AS short_insights FROM trend_analysis LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM client_accounts WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY account_name
SELECT campaign_id, performance_metric, value FROM campaign_performance WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
